title: 赤い光弾ジリオン 歌姫夜曲

search.title: 赤色光弹 歌姬夜曲
search.original_title: 赤い光弾ジリオン 歌姫夜曲
search.overview: In the 24th century, on the war-torn planet Maris the conniving Queen Adama abducts Apple, a member of an heroic trio known as the White Knights, and imprisons her in the infamous Zone. Even though no one has ever returned alive from the Zone — and despite the low ammo at their disposal — the other knights follow their companion. What they find there, however, is an enigmatic figure with a mind-bending revelation...

title: プロジェクトA子3 シンデレラ・ラプソディ

search.title: A子计划3：灰姑娘狂想曲
search.original_title: プロジェクト A子3 - シンデレラ・ラプソディ
search.overview: It revolves around A-Ko and B-ko's pursuit of a handsome stud named Kay. He likes coke and motorcycles and is quietly courted by both A-ko and B-ko. Meanwhile, C-ko grows very jealous of him... Also meanwhile, the aliens' ship in now floating in the bay and they've tried again to turn it into the ultimate nightspot. Good luck. Catastrophe always occurs when the three 'Ko's get together
